meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Macau.
meanings.sent1: In Macau, you can use patacas to buy delicious food.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for patacas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The patacas in my wallet were dancing around happily.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of patacas.
meanings.sent5: The shiny patacas jingled in his pocket.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Macau.

meanings.sent2: Tourists often carry patacas when visiting Macau.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted the patacas around the room.
meanings.sent4: His words were like valuable patacas, each one carefully spent.
meanings.sent5: The sound of patacas clinking together filled the market.
